title: Traditional Embroidery – Phulkari Workshop
description: Learn the centuries-old Punjabi Phulkari embroidery technique. Create a framed piece to take home.

title: Indoor Football Tournament – Corporate League
description: 5-a-side corporate football tournament. Trophies for winners, best player, and fair play. Post-match dinner included.

title: Mindfulness & Stress Relief Seminar
description: Practical techniques for reducing anxiety, improving focus, and building emotional resilience through mindfulness practices.

title: 3D Printing & Prototyping Workshop
description: Design and print your own 3D object using CAD software and industrial-grade printers. Ideal for engineers, designers, and hobbyists.

title: International Cuisine Cooking Class
description: Learn to cook Thai green curry, Italian risotto, and Mexican tacos from professional chefs. Includes tasting and recipe booklet.

title: Youth Leadership Summit
description: One-day summit for students and young professionals on civic engagement, public speaking, and community projects.

title: Retro Gaming Arcade Night
description: Relive the '90s with Pac-Man, Street Fighter, Mario Kart, and more! Snacks, prizes, and high-score competitions.

title: Urban Gardening & Balcony Farming
description: Learn to grow vegetables, herbs, and microgreens in small urban spaces. Includes potting demo and seed kit to take home.

title: Women in Tech Conference 2027
description: Pakistan’s premier conference for women in STEM. Keynotes, panels, and networking with female engineers, founders, and data scientists.
